title: Khmer Rouge Sayings of Angkar Q2

content.question: The ideas expressed in the eighth slogan best reflect which of the following features of communist ideology?

choices.label: It claimed that the means of production ought to be collectivized.
It emphasized the development of large-scale public works to reclaim farmland.

content.answer: It claimed that the means of production ought to be collectivized.
